select1.label: Tap Context ID in list below to load it.
Tap Context Group in list below to load it.

input.label: Here you can enter relationships between contexts, eg ‘Above’ and ‘Below’. Select the Type of Relationship on the left, the related Context from the list on the right, and click the button ‘Relate Contexts’.

item.label: Here you can group contexts into a single Context Group or Feature
Here you can add the Volume of individual lots of a single Context, eg a bucket load, and have the total volume of the Context tallied on the General tab.
Here you can enter filenames or unique reference numbers for image stored on another device.

trigger.label: Save and Duplicate Context (will not duplicate relationships, samples, or artefact groups).
